trans-unit.source: Add a NuGet package reference to the project.
trans-unit.target: 向项目添加 NuGet 包引用。

trans-unit.source: Failed to parse "{0}" as a semantic version.
trans-unit.target: Failed to parse "{0}" as a semantic version.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a version string that the user entered that was not parsed as a Semantic Version

trans-unit.source: Specify one package reference to add.
trans-unit.target: 请指定一个要添加的包引用。

trans-unit.source: Add the reference only when targeting a specific framework.
trans-unit.target: 仅针对特定框架添加引用。

trans-unit.source: Add the reference without performing restore preview and compatibility check.
trans-unit.target: 在没有执行还原预览和兼容性检查的情况下添加引用。

trans-unit.source: The NuGet package source to use during the restore.
trans-unit.target: 要在还原期间使用的 NuGet 包源。

trans-unit.source: The directory to restore packages to.
trans-unit.target: 要将包还原到其中的目录。

trans-unit.source: The version of the package to add.
Unable to create dependency graph file for project '{0}'. Cannot add package reference.
trans-unit.target: 无法为项目“{0}”创建依赖关系图文件。无法添加包引用。

trans-unit.source: The package reference to add. This can be in the form of just the package identifier, for example 'Newtonsoft.Json', or a package identifier and version separated by '@', for example 'Newtonsoft.Json@13.0.3'
Unable to generate a temporary file for project '{0}'. Cannot add package reference. Clear the temp directory and try again.
trans-unit.target: 无法为项目“{0}”生成临时文件。无法添加包引用。请清除临时目录，然后再重试。

trans-unit.source: Cannot specify --version when the package argument already contains a version.
trans-unit.target: Cannot specify --version when the package argument already contains a version.
